name: The Shawshank Redemption
storyline: chronicles experiences of formerly successful banker as prisoner in gloomy jailhouse of shawshank after being found guilty of crime did not commit film portrays mans unique way of dealing with his new torturous life along way befriends number of fellow prisoners most notably wise longterm inmate named red

name: The Godfather
storyline: when aging head of famous crime family decides to transfer his position to one of his subalterns series of unfortunate events start happening to family and war begins between all wellknown families leading to insolence deportation murder and revenge and ends with favorable successor being finally chosen

name: The Godfather: Part II
storyline: continuing saga of corleone crime family tells story of young vito corleone growing up in sicily and in 1910s new york and follows michael corleone in 1950s as attempts to expand family business into las vegas hollywood and cuba

name: The Dark Knight
storyline: set within year after events of batman begins batman lieutenant james gordon and new district attorney harvey dent successfully begin to round up criminals that plague gotham city until mysterious and sadistic criminal mastermind known only as joker appears in gotham creating new wave of chaos batmans struggle against joker becomes deeply personal forcing him to confront everything believes and improve his technology to stop him love triangle develops between bruce wayne dent and rachel dawes

name: 12 Angry Men
storyline: defense and prosecution have rested and jury is filing into jury room to decide if young man is guilty or innocent of murdering his father what begins as openandshut case of murder soon becomes detective story that presents succession of clues creating doubt and minidrama of each of jurors prejudices and preconceptions about trial accused and each other based on play all of action takes place on stage of jury room

name: Schindler's List
storyline: oskar schindler is vainglorious and greedy german businessman who becomes unlikely humanitarian amid barbaric german nazi reign when feels compelled to turn his factory into refuge for jews based on true story of oskar schindler who managed to save about 1100 jews from being gassed at auschwitz concentration camp is testament to good in all of us

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
storyline: final confrontation between forces of good and evil fighting for control of future of middleearth hobbits frodo and sam reach mordor in their quest to destroy one ring while aragorn leads forces of good against saurons evil army at stone city of minas tirith

name: Pulp Fiction
storyline: jules winnfield samuel l jackson and vincent vega john travolta are two hit men who are out to retrieve suitcase stolen from their employer mob boss marsellus wallace ving rhames wallace has also asked vincent to take his wife mia uma thurman out few days later when wallace himself will be out of town butch coolidge bruce willis is aging boxer who is paid by wallace to lose his fight lives of these seemingly unrelated people are woven together comprising of series of funny bizarre and uncalledfor incidents

name: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
storyline: blondie good is professional gunslinger who is out trying to earn few dollars angel eyes bad is hit man who always commits to task and sees through as long as is paid to do so and tuco ugly is wanted outlaw trying to take care of his own hide tuco and blondie share partnership together making money off tucos bounty but when blondie unties partnership tuco tries to hunt down blondie when blondie and tuco come across horse carriage loaded with dead bodies they soon learn from only survivor bill carson that and few other men have buried stash of gold in cemetery unfortunately carson dies and tuco only finds out name of cemetery while blondie finds out name on grave now two must keep each other alive in order to find gold angel eyes who had been looking for bill carson discovers that tuco and blondie met with carson and knows they know location of gold all needs is for two to

name: Fight Club
storyline: nameless first person narrator edward norton attends support groups in attempt to subdue his emotional state and relieve his insomniac state when meets marla helena bonham carter another fake attendee of support groups his life seems to become little more bearable however when associates himself with tyler brad pitt is dragged into underground fight club and soap making scheme together two men spiral out of control and engage in competitive rivalry for love and power when narrator is exposed to hidden agenda of tylers fight club must accept awful truth that tyler may not be who says is

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
storyline: ancient ring thought lost for centuries has been found and through strange twist in fate has been given to small hobbit named frodo when gandalf discovers ring is in fact one ring of dark lord sauron frodo must make epic quest to cracks of doom in order to destroy however does not go alone is joined by gandalf legolas elf gimli dwarf aragorn boromir and his three hobbit friends merry pippin and samwise through mountains snow darkness forests rivers and plains facing evil and danger at every corner fellowship of ring must go their quest to destroy one ring is only hope for end of dark lords reign

name: Forrest Gump
storyline: forrest gump is simple man with low iq but good intentions is running through childhood with his best and only friend jenny his mama teaches him ways of life and leaves him to choose his destiny forrest joins army for service in vietnam finding new friends called dan and bubba wins medals creates famous shrimp fishing fleet inspires people to jog starts pingpong craze creates smiley writes bumper stickers and songs donates to people and meets president several times however this is all irrelevant to forrest who can only think of his childhood sweetheart jenny curran who has messed up her life although in end all wants to prove is that anyone can love anyone

name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
storyline: luke skywalker han solo princess leia and chewbacca face attack by imperial forces and its atat walkers on ice planet hoth while han and leia escape in millennium falcon luke travels to dagobah in search of yoda only with jedi masters help will luke survive when dark side of force beckons him into ultimate duel with darth vader

name: Inception
storyline: dom cobb is skilled thief absolute best in dangerous art of extraction stealing valuable secrets from deep within subconscious during dream state when mind is at its most vulnerable cobbs rare ability has made him coveted player in this treacherous new world of corporate espionage but has also made him international fugitive and cost him everything has ever loved now cobb is being offered chance at redemption one last job could give him his life back but only if can accomplish impossible inception instead of perfect heist cobb and his team of specialists have to pull off reverse their task is not to steal idea but to plant one if they succeed could be perfect crime but no amount of careful planning or expertise can prepare team for dangerous enemy that seems to predict their every move enemy that only cobb could have seen coming

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
storyline: continuing quest of frodo and fellowship to destroy one ring frodo and sam discover they are being followed by mysterious gollum aragorn elf archer legolas and gimli dwarf encounter besieged rohan kingdom whose once great king theoden has fallen under sarumans deadly spell

name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
storyline: mcmurphy has criminal past and has once again gotten himself into trouble and is sentenced by court to escape labor duties in prison mcmurphy pleads insanity and is sent to ward for mentally unstable once here mcmurphy both endures and stands witness to abuse and degradation of oppressive nurse ratched who gains superiority and power through flaws of other inmates mcmurphy and other inmates band together to make rebellious stance against atrocious nurse

name: Goodfellas
storyline: henry hill might be small time gangster who may have taken part in robbery with jimmy conway and tommy de vito two other gangsters who might have set their sights bit higher his two partners could kill off everyone else involved in robbery and slowly start to think about climbing up through hierarchy of mob henry however might be badly affected by his partners success but will consider stooping low enough to bring about downfall of jimmy and tommy

name: The Matrix
storyline: thomas anderson is man living two lives by day is average computer programmer and by night hacker known as neo neo has always questioned his reality but truth is far beyond his imagination neo finds himself targeted by police when is contacted by morpheus legendary computer hacker branded terrorist by government morpheus awakens neo to real world ravaged wasteland where most of humanity have been captured by race of machines that live off of humans body heat and electrochemical energy and who imprison their minds within artificial reality known as matrix as rebel against machines neo must return to matrix and confront agents superpowerful computer programs devoted to snuffing out neo and entire human rebellion

name: Shichinin no samurai
storyline: veteran samurai who has fallen on hard times answers villages request for protection from bandits gathers 6 other samurai to help him and they teach townspeople how to defend themselves and they supply samurai with three small meals day film culminates in giant battle when 40 bandits attack village

name: Se7en
storyline: film about two homicide detectives morgan freeman and brad pitt desperate hunt for serial killer who justifies his crimes as absolution for worlds ignorance of seven deadly sins movie takes us from tortured remains of one victim to next as sociopathic john doe kevin spacey sermonizes to detectives somerset and mills one sin at time sin of gluttony comes first and murderers terrible capacity is graphically demonstrated in dark and subdued tones characteristic of film noir seasoned and cultured but jaded somerset researches seven deadly sins in effort to understand killers modus operandi while bright but green and impulsive detective mills pitt scoffs at his efforts to get inside mind of killer

name: Cidade de Deus
storyline: brazil 1960s city of god tender trio robs motels and gas trucks younger kids watch and learn welltoo well 1970s lil zé has prospered very well and owns city causes violence and fear as wipes out rival gangs without mercy his best friend bené is only one to keep him on good side of sanity rocket has watched these two gain power for years and wants no part of yet keeps getting swept up in madness all wants to do is take pictures 1980s things are out of control between last two remaining gangswill ever end welcome to city of god

name: Star Wars
storyline: imperial forces under orders from cruel darth vader hold princess leia hostage in their efforts to quell rebellion against galactic empire luke skywalker and han solo captain of millennium falcon work together with companionable droid duo r2d2 and c3po to rescue beautiful princess help rebel alliance and restore freedom and justice to galaxy

name: The Silence of the Lambs
storyline: fbi trainee clarice starling works hard to advance her career while trying to hideput behind her west virginia roots of which if some knew would automatically classify her as being backward or white trash after graduation aspires to work in agencys behavioral science unit under leadership of jack crawford while is still trainee crawford asks her to question dr hannibal lecter psychiatrist imprisoned thus far for eight years in maximum security isolation for being serial killer who cannibalized his victims clarice is able to figure out assignment is to pick lecters brains to help them solve another serial murder case that of someone coined by media as buffalo bill who has so far killed five victims all located in eastern us all young women who are slightly overweight especially around hips all who were drowned in natural bodies of water and all who were stripped of large swaths of skin also figures that crawford chose

name: It's a Wonderful Life
storyline: george bailey has spent his entire life giving of himself to people of bedford falls has always longed to travel but never had opportunity in order to prevent rich skinflint mr potter from taking over entire town all that prevents him from doing so is georges modest building and loan company which was founded by his generous father but on christmas eve georges uncle billy loses businesss 8000 while intending to deposit in bank potter finds misplaced money and hides from billy when bank examiner discovers shortage later that night george realizes that will be held responsible and sent to jail and company will collapse finally allowing potter to take over town thinking of his wife their young children and others loves will be better off with him dead contemplates suicide but prayers of his loved ones result in gentle angel named clarence coming to earth to help george with promise of earning his

name: La vita è bella
storyline: in 1930s italy carefree jewish book keeper named guido starts fairy tale life by courting and marrying lovely woman from nearby city guido and his wife have son and live happily together until occupation of italy by german forces in attempt to hold his family together and help his son survive horrors of jewish concentration camp guido imagines that holocaust is game and that grand prize for winning is tank

name: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
storyline: chihiro and her parents are moving to small japanese town in countryside much to chihiros dismay on way to their new home chihiros father makes wrong turn and drives down lonely onelane road which deadends in front of tunnel her parents decide to stop car and explore area they go through tunnel and find abandoned amusement park on other side with its own little town when her parents see restaurant with greatsmelling food but no staff they decide to eat and pay later however chihiro refuses to eat and decides to explore theme park bit more meets boy named haku who tells her that chihiro and her parents are in danger and they must leave immediately runs to restaurant and finds that her parents have turned into pigs in addition theme park turns out to be town inhabited by demons spirits and evil gods at center of town is bathhouse where these creatures go to relax owner of bathhouse

name: Saving Private Ryan
storyline: opening with allied invasion of normandy on 6 june 1944 members of 2nd ranger battalion under cpt miller fight ashore to secure beachhead amidst fighting two brothers are killed in action earlier in new guinea third brother is kia their mother mrs ryan is to receive all three of grave telegrams on same day united states army chief of staff george c marshall is given opportunity to alleviate some of her grief when learns of fourth brother private james ryan and decides to send out 8 men cpt miller and select members from 2nd rangers to find him and bring him back home to his mother

name: The Usual Suspects
storyline: following truck hijack in new york five criminals are arrested and brought together for questioning as none of them are guilty they plan revenge operation against police operation goes well but then influence of legendary mastermind criminal called keyser söze is felt becomes clear that each one of them has wronged söze at some point and must pay back now payback job leaves 27 men dead in boat explosion but real question arises now who actually is keyser söze

name: Léon
storyline: after her father mother older sister and little brother are killed by her fathers employers 12yearold daughter of abject drug dealer is forced to take refuge in apartment of professional hitman who at her request teaches her methods of his job so can take her revenge on corrupt dea agent who ruined her life by killing her beloved brother

name: The Green Mile
storyline: death row guards at penitentiary in 1930s have moral dilemma with their job when they discover one of their prisoners convicted murderer has special gift

name: Interstellar
storyline: earths future has been riddled by disasters famines and droughts there is only one way to ensure mankinds survival interstellar travel newly discovered wormhole in far reaches of our solar system allows team of astronauts to go where no man has gone before planet that may have right environment to sustain human life

name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
storyline: miles morales is new york teen struggling with school friends and on top of that being new spiderman when comes across peter parker erstwhile saviour of new york in multiverse miles must train to become new protector of his city

name: Psycho
storyline: phoenix office worker marion crane is fed up with way life has treated her has to meet her lover sam in lunch breaks and they cannot get married because sam has to give most of his money away in alimony one friday marion is trusted to bank forty thousand dollars by her employer seeing opportunity to take money and start new life marion leaves town and heads towards sams california store tired after long drive and caught in storm gets off main highway and pulls into bates motel motel is managed by quiet young man called norman who seems to be dominated by his mother

name: American History X
storyline: derek vineyard is paroled after serving 3 years in prison for brutally killing two black men who tried to break intosteal his truck through his brother danny vineyards narration we learn that before going to prison derek was skinhead and leader of violent white supremacist gang that committed acts of racial crime throughout la and his actions greatly influenced danny reformed and fresh out of prison derek severs contact with gang and becomes determined to keep danny from going down same violent path as did

name: City Lights
storyline: tramp falls in love with beautiful blind girl her family is in financial trouble tramps onandoff friendship with wealthy man allows him to be girls benefactor and suitor

name: Casablanca
storyline: story of rick blaine cynical worldweary expatriate who runs nightclub in casablanca morocco during early stages of wwii despite pressure constantly receives from local authorities ricks cafe has become kind of haven for refugees seeking to obtain illicit letters that will help them escape to america but when ilsa former lover of ricks and her husband show up to his cafe one day rick faces tough challenge which will bring up unforeseen complications heartbreak and ultimately excruciating decision to make

name: Once Upon a Time in the West
storyline: story of young woman mrs mcbain who moves from new orleans to frontier utah on very edge of american west arrives to find her new husband and family slaughtered but by whom prime suspect coffeelover cheyenne befriends her and offers to go after real killer assassin gang leader frank in her honor is accompanied by harmonica man already on quest to get even

name: The Pianist
storyline: in this adaptation of autobiography pianist extraordinary true story of one mans survival in warsaw 19391945 wladyslaw szpilman polish jewish radio station pianist sees warsaw change gradually as world war ii begins szpilman is forced into warsaw ghetto but is later separated from his family during operation reinhard from this time until concentration camp prisoners are released szpilman hides in various locations among ruins of warsaw

name: Modern Times
storyline: chaplins last silent film filled with sound effects was made when everyone else was making talkies charlie turns against modern society machine age use of sound in films and progress firstly we see him frantically trying to keep up with production line tightening bolts is selected for experiment with automatic feeding machine but various mishaps leads his boss to believe has gone mad and charlie is sent to mental hospital when gets out is mistaken for communist while waving red flag sent to jail foils jailbreak and is let out again we follow charlie through many more escapades before film is out

name: The Intouchables
storyline: in paris aristocratic and intellectual philippe is quadriplegic millionaire who is interviewing candidates for position of his carer with his redhaired secretary magalie out of blue driss cuts line of candidates and brings document from social security and asks phillipe to sign to prove that is seeking job position so can receive his unemployment benefit philippe challenges driss offering him trial period of one month to gain experience helping him then driss can decide whether would like to stay with him or not driss accepts challenge and moves to mansion changing boring life of phillipe and his employees

name: The Departed
storyline: in south boston state police force is waging war on irishamerican organized crime young undercover cop billy costigan is assigned to infiltrate mob syndicate run by gangland chief frank costello while billy quickly gains costellos confidence colin sullivan hardened young criminal who has infiltrated state police as informer for syndicate is rising to position of power in special investigation unit each man becomes deeply consumed by their double lives gathering information about plans and counterplans of operations they have penetrated but when becomes clear to both mob and police that there is mole in their midst billy and colin are suddenly in danger of being caught and exposed to enemy and each must race to uncover identity of other man in time to save themselves but is either willing to turn on their friends and comrades theyve made during their long stints undercover

name: Back to the Future
storyline: marty mcfly typical american teenager of eighties is accidentally sent back to 1955 in plutoniumpowered delorean time machine invented by slightly mad scientist during his often hysterical always amazing trip back in time marty must make certain his teenage parentstobe meet and fall in love so can get back to future

name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
storyline: over 10 years have passed since first cyborg called terminator tried to kill sarah connor and her unborn son john connor john connor future leader of human resistance is now healthy young boy however another terminator is sent back through time called t1000 which is more advanced and more powerful than its predecessor mission to kill john connor when hes still child however sarah and john do not have to face this threat of terminator alone another terminator is also sent back through time mission to protect john and sarah connor at all costs battle for tomorrow has begun

name: Whiplash
storyline: young and talented drummer attending prestigious music academy finds himself under wing of most respected professor at school one who does not hold back on abuse towards his students two form odd relationship as student wants to achieve greatness and professor pushes him

name: Rear Window
storyline: professional photographer lb jeff jefferies breaks his leg while getting action shot at auto race confined to his new york apartment spends his time looking out of rear window observing neighbors begins to suspect that man across courtyard may have murdered his wife jeff enlists help of his high society fashionconsultant girlfriend lisa freemont and his visiting nurse stella to investigate

name: The Lion King
storyline: young lion prince is cast out of his pride by his cruel uncle who claims killed his father while uncle rules with iron paw prince grows up beyond savannah living by philosophy no worries for rest of your days but when his past comes to haunt him young prince must decide his fate will remain outcast or face his demons and become what needs to be

name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
storyline: year is 1936 archeology professor named indiana jones is venturing in jungles of south america searching for golden statue unfortunately sets off deadly trap but miraculously escapes then jones hears from museum curator named marcus brody about biblical artifact called ark of covenant which can hold key to humanly existence jones has to venture to vast places such as nepal and egypt to find this artifact however will have to fight his enemy rene belloq and band of nazis in order to reach

name: Gladiator
storyline: maximus is powerful roman general loved by people and aging emperor marcus aurelius before his death emperor chooses maximus to be his heir over his own son commodus and power struggle leaves maximus and his family condemned to death powerful general is unable to save his family and his loss of will allows him to get captured and put into gladiator games until dies only desire that fuels him now is chance to rise to top so that will be able to look into eyes of man who will feel his revenge

name: The Prestige
storyline: in end of nineteenth century in london robert angier his beloved wife julia mccullough and alfred borden are friends and assistants of magician when julia accidentally dies during performance robert blames alfred for her death and they become enemies both become famous and rival magicians sabotaging performance of other on stage when alfred performs successful trick robert becomes obsessed trying to disclose secret of his competitor with tragic consequences

name: Apocalypse Now
storyline: is height of war in vietnam and us army captain willard is sent by colonel lucas and general to carry out mission that officially does not exist nor will ever exist mission to seek out mysterious green beret colonel walter kurtz whose army has crossed border into cambodia and is conducting hitandrun missions against viet cong and nva army believes kurtz has gone completely insane and willards job is to eliminate him willard sent up nung river on us navy patrol boat discovers that his target is one of most decorated officers in us army his crew meets up with surfertype ltcolonel kilgore head of us army helicopter cavalry group which eliminates viet cong outpost to provide entry point into nung river after some hairraising encounters in which some of his crew are killed willard lance and chef reach colonel kurtzs outpost beyond do lung bridge now after becoming prisoners of kurtz will

name: Memento
storyline: memento chronicles two separate stories of leonard exinsurance investigator who can no longer build new memories as attempts to find murderer of his wife which is last thing remembers one story line moves forward in time while other tells story backwards revealing more each time

name: Alien
storyline: in distant future crew of commercial spaceship nostromo are on their way home when they pick up distress call from distant moon crew are under obligation to investigate and spaceship descends on moon afterwards after rough landing three crew members leave spaceship to explore area on moon at same time as they discover hive colony of some unknown creature ships computer deciphers message to be warning not distress call when one of eggs is disturbed crew realizes that they are not alone on spaceship and they must deal with consequences

name: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
storyline: boy who grew up in native sicilian village returns home as famous director after receiving news about death of old friend told in flashback salvatore reminiscences about his childhood and his relationship with alfredo projectionist at cinema paradiso under fatherly influence of alfredo salvatore fell in love with film making with duo spending many hours discussing about films and alfredo painstakingly teaching salvatore skills that became stepping stone for young boy into world of film making film brings audience through changes in cinema and dying trade of traditional film making editing and screening also explores young boys dream of leaving his little town to foray into world outside

name: Hotaru no haka
storyline: story of seita and satsuko two young japanese siblings living in declining days of world war ii when american firebombing separates two children from their parents two siblings must rely completely on one another while they struggle to fight for their survival

name: The Great Dictator
storyline: 20 years after end of wwi in which nation of tomainia was on losing side adenoid hynkel has risen to power as ruthless dictator of country believes in pure aryan state and decimation of jews this situation is unknown to simple jewish tomainian barber who has been hospitalized since wwi battle upon his release barber who had been suffering from memory loss about war is shown new persecuted life of jews by many living in jewish ghetto including washerwoman named hannah with whom begins relationship barber is ultimately spared such persecution by commander schultz whom saved in that wwi battle lives of all jews in tomainia are eventually spared with policy shift by hynkel himself who is doing so for ulterior motives but those motives include desire for world domination starting with invasion of neighboring osterlich which may be threatened by benzino napaloni dictator of neighboring

name: Sunset Blvd.
storyline: in hollywood of 50s obscure screenplay writer joe gillis is not able to sell his work to studios is full of debts and is thinking in returning to his hometown to work in office while trying to escape from his creditors has flat tire and parks his car in decadent mansion in sunset boulevard meets owner and former silentmovie star norma desmond who lives alone with her butler and driver max von mayerling norma is demented and believes will return to cinema industry and is protected and isolated from world by max who was her director and husband in past and still loves her norma proposes joe to move to mansion and help her in writing screenplay for her comeback to cinema and smalltime writer becomes her lover and gigolo when joe falls in love for young aspirant writer betty schaefer norma becomes jealous and completely insane and her madness leads to tragic end

name: The Lives of Others
storyline: gerd wiesler is officer with stasi east german secret police film begins in 1984 when wiesler attends play written by georg dreyman who is considered by many to be ultimate example of loyal citizen wiesler has gut feeling that dreyman cant be as ideal as seems and believes surveillance is called for minister of culture agrees but only later does wiesler learn that minister sees dreyman as rival and lusts after his partner christamaria more time spends listening in on them more comes to care about them once rigid stasi officer begins to intervene in their lives in positive way protecting them whenever possible eventually wieslers activities catch up to him and while there is no proof of wrongdoing finds himself in menial jobs until unbelievable happens

name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
storyline: paranoid brigadier general jack d ripper of burpelson air force base believing that fluoridation of american water supply is soviet plot to poison us populace is able to deploy through back door mechanism nuclear attack on soviet union without knowledge of his superiors including chair of joint chiefs of staff general buck turgidson and president merkin muffley only ripper knows code to recall b52 bombers and has shut down communication in and out of burpelson as measure to protect this attack rippers executive officer raf group captain lionel mandrake on exchange from britain who is being held at burpelson by ripper believes knows recall codes if can only get message to outside world meanwhile at pentagon war room key persons including muffley turgidson and nuclear scientist and adviser former nazi named dr strangelove are discussing measures to stop attack or mitigate its blowup into all

name: Paths of Glory
storyline: futility and irony of war in trenches in wwi is shown as unit commander in french army must deal with mutiny of his men and gloryseeking general after part of his force falls back under fire in impossible attack

name: Avengers: Infinity War
storyline: as avengers and their allies have continued to protect world from threats too large for any one hero to handle new danger has emerged from cosmic shadows thanos despot of intergalactic infamy his goal is to collect all six infinity stones artifacts of unimaginable power and use them to inflict his twisted will on all of reality everything avengers have fought for has led up to this moment fate of earth and existence has never been more uncertain

name: The Shining
storyline: signing contract jack torrance normal writer and former teacher agrees to take care of hotel which has long violent past that puts everyone in hotel in nervous situation while jack slowly gets more violent and angry of his life his son danny tries to use special talent shining to inform people outside about whatever that is going on in hotel

name: Django Unchained
storyline: in 1858 bounty hunter named schultz seeks out slave named django and buys him because needs him to find some men is looking for after finding them django wants to find his wife broomhilda who along with him were sold separately by his former owner for trying to escape schultz offers to help him if chooses to stay with him and be his partner eventually they learn that was sold to plantation in mississippi knowing they cant just go in and say they want her they come up with plan so that owner will welcome them into his home and they can find way

name: WALL·E
storyline: in distant but not so unrealistic future where mankind has abandoned earth because has become covered with trash from products sold by powerful multinational buy n large corporation walle garbage collecting robot has been left to clean up mess mesmerized with trinkets of earths history and show tunes walle is alone on earth except for sprightly pet cockroach one day eve sleek and dangerous reconnaissance robot is sent to earth to find proof that life is once again sustainable walle falls in love with eve walle rescues eve from dust storm and shows her living plant found amongst rubble consistent with her directive eve takes plant and automatically enters deactivated state except for blinking green beacon walle doesnt understand what has happened to his new friend but true to his love protects her from wind rain and lightning even as is unresponsive one day massive ship comes to reclaim eve but walle

name: Mononoke-hime
storyline: while protecting his village from rampaging boargoddemon confident young warrior ashitaka is stricken by deadly curse to save his life must journey to forests of west once there hes embroiled in fierce campaign that humans were waging on forest ambitious lady eboshi and her loyal clan use their guns against gods of forest and brave young woman princess mononoke who was raised by wolfgod ashitaka sees good in both sides and tries to stem flood of blood this is met by animosity by both sides as they each see him as supporting enemy

name: Witness for the Prosecution
storyline: its britain 1953 upon his return to work following heart attack irrepressible barrister sir wilfrid robarts known as barrister for hopeless takes on murder case much to exasperation of his medical team led by his overly regulated private nurse miss plimsoll who tries her hardest to ensure that not return to his hard living ways including excessive cigar smoking and drinking while takes his medication and gets his much needed rest that case is defending american war veteran leonard vole poor out of work struggling inventor who is accused of murdering his fiftysix year old lonely and wealthy widowed acquaintance emily french initial evidence is circumstantial but points to leonard as murderer despite being happily married to east german former beer hall performer christine vole fostered that friendship with mrs french in hopes that would finance one of his many inventions to tune of few hundred pounds thus does

name: Oldeuboi
storyline: abducted on rainy night in 1988 obnoxious drunk oh daesu much to his surprise wakes up locked in windowless and dilapidated hotel room for unknown reason there his invisible and pitiless captors will feed him clothe him and sedate him to avoid committing suicide and as his only companion and window to world is tv in his stark cell only thing that helps oh daesu keep going is his daily journal but then unexpectedly after fifteen long years in captivity perplexed prisoner is deliberately released encouraged to track down his tormentor to finally get his retribution nevertheless who would hate oh daesu so much would deny him of quick and clean death

name: The Dark Knight Rises
storyline: despite his tarnished reputation after events of dark knight in which took rap for dents crimes batman feels compelled to intervene to assist city and its police force which is struggling to cope with banes plans to destroy city

name: Aliens
storyline: 57 years after ellen ripley had close encounter with reptilian alien creature from first movie is called back this time to help group of highly trained colonial marines fight off against sinister extraterrestrials but this time aliens have taken over space colony on moon lv426 when colonial marines are called upon to search deserted space colony they later find out that they are up against more than what they bargained for using specially modified machine guns and enough firepower its either fight or die as space marines battle against aliens as marines do their best to defend themselves ripley must attempt to protect young girl who is sole survivor of decimated space colony

name: American Beauty
storyline: after his death sometime in his fortythird year suburbanite lester burnham tells of last few weeks of his life during which had no idea of his imminent passing is husband to real estate agent carolyn burnham and father to high school student janie burnham although lester and carolyn once loved each other they now merely tolerate each other typical wallflower janie too hates both her parents three who suffer individually in silence in their home life janie tries to steer clear of both her parents carolyn relatively new to real estate business wants to create persona of success to further her career aspiring to professional life of buddy kane king of real estate business in their neighborhood lester merely walks mindlessly through life including at his job in advertising his company is downsizing and like all other employees has to justify his position to newly hired efficiency expert to keep his job things change

name: Once Upon a Time in America
storyline: epic tale of group of jewish gangsters in new york from childhood through their glory years during prohibition and their meeting again 35 years later

name: Coco
storyline: despite his familys baffling generationsold ban on music miguel dreams of becoming accomplished musician like his idol ernesto de la cruz desperate to prove his talent miguel finds himself in stunning and colorful land of dead following mysterious chain of events along way meets charming trickster hector and together they set off on extraordinary journey to unlock real story behind miguels family history

name: Das Boot
storyline: is 1942 and german submarine fleet is heavily engaged in socalled battle of atlantic to harass and destroy british shipping with better escorts of destroyer class however german uboats have begun to take heavy losses das boot is story of crew of one such uboat with film examining how these submariners maintained their professionalism as soldiers and attempted to accomplish impossible missions all while attempting to understand and obey ideology of government under which they served

name: Citizen Kane
storyline: group of reporters are trying to decipher last word ever spoken by charles foster kane millionaire newspaper tycoon rosebud film begins with news reel detailing kanes life for masses and then from there we are shown flashbacks from kanes life as reporters investigate further viewers see display of fascinating mans rise to fame and how eventually fell off top of world

name: Braveheart
storyline: william wallace is scottish rebel who leads uprising against cruel english ruler edward longshanks who wishes to inherit crown of scotland for himself when was young boy william wallaces father and brother along with many others lost their lives trying to free scotland once loses another of his loved ones william wallace begins his long quest to make scotland free once and for all along with assistance of robert bruce

name: Vertigo
storyline: john scottie ferguson is retired san francisco police detective who suffers from acrophobia and madeleine is lady who leads him to high places wealthy shipbuilder who is acquaintance from college days approaches scottie and asks him to follow his beautiful wife madeleine fears is going insane maybe even contemplating suicide as believes has been possessed by dead ancestor who committed suicide scottie is skeptical but agrees to assignment after sees beautiful madeleine

name: North by Northwest
storyline: madison avenue advertising man roger thornhill finds himself thrust into world of spies when is mistaken for man by name of george kaplan foreign spy philip vandamm and his henchman leonard try to eliminate him but when thornhill tries to make sense of case is framed for murder now on run from police manages to board 20th century limited bound for chicago where meets beautiful blond eve kendall who helps him to evade authorities his world is turned upside down yet again when learns that eve isnt innocent bystander thought was not all is as seems however leading to dramatic rescue and escape at top of mt rushmore

name: Reservoir Dogs
storyline: six criminals who are strangers to each other are hired by crime boss joe cabot to carry out diamond robbery right at outset they are given false names with intention that they wont get too close and will concentrate on job instead they are completely sure that robbery is going to be success but when police show up right at time and site of robbery panic spreads amongst group members and two of them are killed in subsequent shootout along with few policemen and civilians when remaining people assemble at premeditated rendezvous point warehouse they begin to suspect that one of them is undercover cop

name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
storyline: luke skywalker battles jabba hutt and darth vader to save his comrades in rebel alliance and triumph over galactic empire han solo and princess leia reaffirm their love and team with chewbacca lando calrissian ewoks and droids c3po and r2d2 to aid in disruption of dark side and defeat of evil emperor

name: Kimi no na wa.
storyline: mitsuha is daughter of mayor of small mountain town shes straightforward high school girl who lives with her sister and her grandmother and has no qualms about letting be known that shes uninterested in shinto rituals or helping her fathers electoral campaign instead dreams of leaving boring town and trying her luck in tokyo taki is high school boy in tokyo who works parttime in italian restaurant and aspires to become architect or artist every night has strange dream where becomesa high school girl in small mountain town

name: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mörder
storyline: in germany hans beckert is unknown killer of girls whistles edvard griegs in hall of mountain king from peer gynt suite i op 46 while attracting little girls for death police force pressed by minister give its best effort trying unsuccessfully to arrest serial killer organized crime has great losses due to intense search and siege of police and decides to chase murderer with support of beggars association they catch hans and briefly judge him

name: Amadeus
storyline: antonio salieri believes that wolfgang amadeus mozarts music is divine and miraculous wishes was himself as good musician as mozart so that can praise lord through composing began his career as devout man who believes his success and talent as composer are gods rewards for his piety hes also content as respected financially welloff court composer of austrian emperor joseph ii but hes shocked to learn that mozart is such vulgar creature and cant understand why god favored mozart to be his instrument salieris envy has made him enemy of god whose greatness was evident in mozart is ready to take revenge against god and mozart for his own musical mediocrity

name: Requiem for a Dream
storyline: sara goldfarb ellen burstyn is retired widow living in small apartment spends most of her time watching tv especially particular selfhelp show has delusions of rising above her current dull existence by being guest on that show her son harry jared leto is junkie but along with his friend tyrone marlon wayans has visions of making big by becoming drug dealer harrys girlfriend marion jennifer connelly could be fashion designer or artist but is swept along in harrys drugcentric world meanwhile sara has developed addiction of her own desperately wants to lose weight and so goes on crash course involving popping pills pills which turn out to be very addictive and harmful to her mental state

name: Dangal
storyline: biopic of mahavir singh phogat who taught wrestling to his daughters babita kumari and geeta phogat geeta phogat was indias first female wrestler to win at 2010 commonwealth games where won gold medal 55 kg while her sister babita kumari won silver 51 kg

name: Taare Zameen Par
storyline: ishaan awasthi is eightyearold child whose world is filled with wonders that no one else seems to appreciate colours fish dogs and kites are just not important in world of adults who are much more interested in things like homework marks and neatness and ishaan just cannot seem to get anything right in class when gets into far more trouble than his parents can handle is packed off to boarding school to be disciplined things are no different at his new school and ishaan has to contend with added trauma of separation from his family one day new art teacher bursts onto scene ram shankar nikumbh who infects students with joy and optimism breaks all rules of how things are done by asking them to think dream and imagine and all children respond with enthusiasm all except ishaan nikumbh soon realizes that ishaan is very unhappy and sets out to discover why with time patience and care ultimately helps ishaan find

name: 3 Idiots
storyline: farhan qureshi and raju rastogi want to reunite with their fellow collegian rancho after faking stroke aboard air india plane and excusing himself from his wife trouser less respectively enroute they encounter another student chatur ramalingam now successful businessman who reminds them of bet they had undertaken 10 years ago trio while recollecting hilarious antics including their runins with dean of delhis imperial college of engineering viru sahastrabudhe race to locate rancho at his last known address little knowing secret that was kept from them all this time

name: Lawrence of Arabia
storyline: due to his knowledge of native bedouin tribes british lieutenant te lawrence is sent to arabia to find prince faisal and serve as liaison between arabs and british in their fight against turks with aid of native sherif ali lawrence rebels against orders of his superior officer and strikes out on daring camel journey across harsh desert to attack wellguarded turkish port

name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
storyline: man joel barish heartbroken that his girlfriend clementine underwent procedure to erase him from her memory decides to do same however as watches his memories of her fade away realizes that still loves her and may be too late to correct his mistake

name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
storyline: 2001 is story of evolution sometime in distant past someone or something nudged evolution by placing monolith on earth presumably elsewhere throughout universe as well evolution then enabled humankind to reach moons surface where yet another monolith is found one that signals monolith placers that humankind has evolved that far now race begins between computers hal and human bowman to reach monolith placers winner will achieve next step in evolution whatever that may be

name: Toy Story
storyline: little boy named andy loves to be in his room playing with his toys especially his doll named woody but what do toys do when andy is not with them they come to life woody believes that his life as toy is good however must worry about andys family moving and what woody does not know is about andys birthday party woody does not realize that andys mother gave him action figure known as buzz lightyear who does not believe that is toy and quickly becomes andys new favorite toy woody who is now consumed with jealousy tries to get rid of buzz then both woody and buzz are now lost they must find way to get back to andy before moves without them but they will have to pass through ruthless toy killer sid phillips

name: A Clockwork Orange
storyline: protagonist alex delarge is ultraviolent youth in futuristic britain as with all luck his eventually runs out and hes arrested and convicted of murder and rape while in prison alex learns of experimental program in which convicts are programmed to detest violence if goes through program his sentence will be reduced and will be back on streets sooner than expected but alexs ordeals are far from over once hits mean streets of britain that had hand in creating

name: Amélie
storyline: amélie is story about girl named amélie whose childhood was suppressed by her fathers mistaken concerns of heart defect with these concerns amélie gets hardly any real life contact with other people this leads amélie to resort to her own fantastical world and dreams of love and beauty later on becomes young woman and moves to central part of paris as waitress after finding lost treasure belonging to former occupant of her apartment decides to return to him after seeing his reaction and his new found perspective decides to devote her life to people around her such as her father who is obsessed with his gardengnome failed writer hypochondriac man who stalks his ex girlfriends ghost suppressed young soul love of her life and man whose bones are as brittle as glass but after consuming herself with these escapades finds out that is disregarding her own life and damaging her quest for love amélie then

name: Double Indemnity
storyline: in 1938 walter neff experienced salesman of pacific all risk insurance co meets seductive wife of one of his clients phyllis dietrichson and they have affair phyllis proposes to kill her husband to receive proceeds of accident insurance policy and walter devises scheme to receive twice amount based on double indemnity clause when mr dietrichson is found dead on train track police accept determination of accidental death however insurance analyst and walters best friend barton keyes does not buy story and suspects that phyllis has murdered her husband with help of another man

name: Singin' in the Rain
storyline: 1927 hollywood monumental pictures biggest stars glamorous onscreen couple lina lamont and don lockwood are also offscreen couple if trade papers and gossip columns are to be believed both perpetuate public perception if only to please their adoring fans and bring people into movie theaters in reality don barely tolerates her while lina despite thinking don beneath her simplemindedly believes what sees on screen in order to bolster her own stardom and sense of selfimportance rf simpson monumentals head dismisses what thinks is flash in pan talking pictures isnt until jazz singer 1927 becomes bona fide hit which results in all movie theaters installing sound equipment that rf knows monumental most specifically in form of don and lina have to jump on talking picture bandwagon despite no one at studio knowing anything about technology musician cosmo brown dons best friend gets hired as monumentals

name: Taxi Driver
storyline: travis bickle is exmarine and vietnam war veteran living in new york city as suffers from insomnia spends his time working as taxi driver at night watching porn movies at seedy cinemas during day or thinking about how world new york in particular has deteriorated into cesspool hes loner who has strong opinions about what is right and wrong with mankind for him one bright spot in new york humanity is betsy worker on presidential nomination campaign of senator charles palantine becomes obsessed with her after incident with her believes has to do whatever needs to make world better place in his opinion one of his priorities is to be savior for iris twelveyearold runaway and prostitute who believes wants out of profession and under thumb of her pimp and lover matthew

name: Inglourious Basterds
storyline: in germanoccupied france young jewish refugee shosanna dreyfus witnesses slaughter of her family by colonel hans landa narrowly escaping with her life plots her revenge several years later when german war hero fredrick zoller takes rapid interest in her and arranges illustrious movie premiere at theater now runs with promise of every major nazi officer in attendance event catches attention of basterds group of jewishamerican guerrilla soldiers led by ruthless lt aldo raine as relentless executioners advance and conspiring young girls plans are set in motion their paths will cross for fateful evening that will shake very annals of history

name: Full Metal Jacket
storyline: twosegment look at effect of military mindset and war itself on vietnam era marines first half follows group of recruits in boot camp under command of punishing gunnery sergeant hartman second half shows one of those recruits joker covering war as correspondent for stars and stripes focusing on tet offensive

name: Ladri di biciclette
storyline: ricci unemployed man in depressed postwwii economy of italy gets at last good job for which needs bike hanging up posters but soon his bicycle is stolen and his son walk streets of rome looking for bicycle ricci finally manages to locate thief but with no proof has to abandon his cause but and his son know perfectly well that without bike ricci wont be able to keep his job

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
storyline: smalltown alabama 1932 atticus finch played by gregory peck is lawyer and widower has two young children jem and scout atticus finch is currently defending tom robinson black man accused of raping white woman meanwhile jem and scout are intrigued by their neighbours radleys and mysterious seldomseen boo radley in particular

name: The Kid
storyline: opening title reads comedy with smileand perhaps tear as leaves charity hospital and passes church wedding edna deposits her new baby with pleading note in limousine and goes off to commit suicide limo is stolen by thieves who dump baby by garbage can charlie tramp finds baby and makes home for him five years later edna has become opera star but does charity work for slum youngsters in hope of finding her boy doctor called by edna discovers note with truth about kid and reports to authorities who come to take him away from charlie before arrives at orphan asylum charlie steals him back and takes him to flophouse proprietor reads of reward for kid and takes him to edna charlie is later awakened by kind policeman who reunites him with kid at ednas mansion

name: The Sting
storyline: johnny hooker small time grifter unknowingly steals from doyle lonnegan big time crime boss when pulls standard street con lonnegan demands satisfaction for insult after his partner luther is killed hooker flees and seeks help of henry gondorff one of luthers contacts who is master of long con hooker wants to use gondorffs expertise to take lonnegan for enormous sum of money to even score since admits doesnt know enough about killing to kill him they devise complicated scheme and amass talented group of other con artists who want their share of reparations stakes are high in this game and our heroes must not only deal with lonnegans murderous tendencies but also other side players who want piece of action to win hooker and gondorff will need all their skillsand fair amount of confidence
